tasks.test: echo '🧪 Running tests for all workspace projects...' && deno task test:all
tasks.test:all: deno task test:ai-api && deno task test:profile-service && deno task test:ai-chat && deno task test:testing-infrastructure
tasks.test:unit: echo '🔬 Running unit tests for all projects...' && deno task test:unit:ai-api && deno task test:unit:profile-service && deno task test:unit:ai-chat
tasks.test:e2e: echo '🌐 Running E2E tests for all projects...' && deno task test:e2e:ai-api && deno task test:e2e:profile-service && deno task test:e2e:ai-chat
tasks.test:ai-api: echo '🔧 Testing AI-API (unit + E2E)...' && cd internal/ai-api && deno task test && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:profile-service: echo '👤 Testing Profile Service (unit + E2E)...' && cd internal/profile-service && deno task test && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:ai-chat: echo '💬 Testing ai-chat (unit + E2E)...' && cd web/ai-chat && deno task test && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:testing-infrastructure: echo '🛠️ Testing infrastructure package...' && cd packages/testing-infrastructure && (deno test --allow-all || echo 'ℹ️ No tests found in testing-infrastructure (expected)')
tasks.test:unit:ai-api: echo '🔬 AI-API unit tests...' && cd internal/ai-api && deno task test
tasks.test:unit:profile-service: echo '🔬 Profile Service unit tests...' && cd internal/profile-service && deno task test
tasks.test:unit:ai-chat: echo '🔬 ai-chat unit tests...' && cd web/ai-chat && deno task test
tasks.test:e2e:ai-api: echo '🌐 AI-API E2E tests...' && cd internal/ai-api && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:e2e:profile-service: echo '🌐 Profile Service E2E tests...' && cd internal/profile-service && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:e2e:ai-chat: echo '🌐 ai-chat E2E tests...' && cd web/ai-chat && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:watch: echo 'Please specify which project to watch. Use: deno task test:watch:ai-api, deno task test:watch:profile-service, or deno task test:watch:ai-chat'
